entities.description: Any long-lasting or repeated physical health problems caused or worsened by methamphetamine in the past 12 months.
Continuing to use methamphetamine even though it was causing long-lasting or repeated physical health problems or making them worse.
Any long-lasting or repeated problems with emotions or mental health caused or worsened by methamphetamine in the past 12 months.
Continuing to use methamphetamine even though it was causing long-lasting or repeated problems with emotions or mental health or making them worse.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to questions about long-lasting or repeated physical health problems caused or worsened by methamphetamine.
Indicates whether the respondent used methamphetamine.
Indicates whether the respondent continued to use methamphetamine despite having physical health problems caused or worsened by it.
Relates the survey to questions about long-lasting or repeated problems with emotions or mental health caused or worsened by methamphetamine.
Indicates whether the respondent continued to use methamphetamine despite having emotional or mental health problems caused or worsened by it.
